title: What Is Durvalumab, The Imfinzi's Cancer Drug That Just Got CDSCO Approval?
summary: Unlike traditional chemotherapy, which attacks rapidly dividing cells (both healthy and cancerous), Durvalumab helps your own immune system recognise and destroy cancer cells. It targets a specific protein called PD-L1.
